thread.section_title: Hotel Tourisme Avenue - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location & helpful staff
thread.title_full: Great location & helpful staff - Review of Hotel Tourisme Avenue, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: DaniW6
title: Great location & helpful staff
text:
Have just come home from a weekend away at this hotel. My husband and I speak very little French. The staff were most accommodating showing us a map of the city and the places to visit.
After unpacking I reaslised I'd forgotten to pack a plug adapter, I went to reception who were more than happy to lend me one for the duration of our stay.
The rooms were spotless and very clean. We did not have the breakfast so I cannot comment. However I'd highly recommend hotel tourisme avenue.
It's also right by the metro so if you are not up for walking, getting around the city is super easy!
